title: Video: Sunless '97 – Aurora I
body:
We posted the new track from London based 3 piece **Sunless ’97** only a few days ago, and already the single has a video.

It’s, well, not to my taste at all, I slightly resent videos of a band doing ‘stuff’. Here’s us in a club, here’s us be vaguely existential, here’s us having the time of our lives ect. The tracks actually growing on me though.
